title: Na boards are 10000 times better than euw
body:
God, u can say something with no worries to get downvote, (i mean, if the post is actually good) everyone answers without being toxic, in euw, u get 3 downvote, Almost INSTANTLY, if they dont like the tittle, lul.
Also, the post here are so interesting, u must visit euw forum... (They only Talk about toxicity and champs that need buff or nerfs and scrims)
Well, im from Spain, sorry for my english and thanks, This continent is so fukin' amazing i would change to here with no doubt

replies.body:
Welcome to the NA boards, just don't bring up yasuo/vayne needing buffs and most people won't flame you.

{{sticker:vlad-salute}}
yasuo is definitely in need of buff; give him 100% armor pen for 30 seconds everytime he uses E on a minion
Checking this in now. Keep your eyes on the next pbe!

Finally, our prayers have been answered!

Could you buff Zoe while you're at it? I feel like her Q doesn't travel fast enough or hit hard enough. 

Also please nerf Irelia. We haven't seen a nerf for her in a a while and we need one just to make sure it's you guys at Riot HQ and not some imposters.

I think E lasts for too short of a time. Sometimes my Q is on cooldown when I land E.
Maybe lower cooldown for Q and increase duration for E? It'd be a good quality of life change
forwarding this directly to the team that built the runes system.

> [{quoted}](name=Maple Nectar,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rsBTQhEo,comment-id=00000000000100070000,timestamp=2018-02-28T01:28:41.182+0000)
>
> forwarding this directly to the team that built the runes system.

Thankyou, I didnt want this issue to die off like the other posts from as far back as 3 months ago.
why did you delete it?

> [{quoted}](name=AnataBakka,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rsBTQhEo,comment-id=0000000000010007000000000001,timestamp=2018-02-28T13:44:23.229+0000)
>
> why did you delete it?

I didnt, riot did
I'm aware of at least 2 major gameplay glitches currently and have been trying to get one fixed for over 3 years, congrats on actually getting results ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
[That's not funny.](https://i.imgur.com/kVFucjd.gif)
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Hey and could like, annie cause a silence to opponents whenever Timbers damages them?
*laughs until new fighter rune is out and then starts crying

> [{quoted}](name=Maple Nectar,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rsBTQhEo,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2018-02-27T16:52:42.556+0000)
>
> Checking this in now. Keep your eyes on the next pbe!

Yes, this is the quality content we need! {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=notice me Sin pi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rsBTQhEo,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-02-27T12:52:37.753+0000)
>
> yasuo is definitely in need of buff; give him 100% armor pen for 30 seconds everytime he uses E on a minion

what he needs is a 150% armor penetration,so more they stack armor more you deal damage  ({{champion:33}})

Yes, and if they don’t have any bonus armor, you deal 150% damage to them

Also yasuo gets 15% evasion on every auto attack because the wind should deflect enemy attacks sometimes

> [{quoted}](name=YaRossy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rsBTQhEo,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-02-27T03:34:32.298+0000)
>
> Welcome to the NA boards, just don't bring up yasuo/vayne needing buffs and most people won't flame you.
> 
> {{sticker:vlad-salute}}

DON'T FORGET ZOE BUFFS, Do NOT and I repeat DO NOT ASK FOR BUFFS.
There's an EUW board?

Southern hospitality and charm + Generally friendly Midwesterners + Canadians = Very friendly environment. 

If it was just people from New York and New Jersey, it would be a very different place.

Only because in New York and Jersey there are too many people for anyone to like people anymore.

everywhere else not east coast and California has enough elbow room to tolerate a human being long enough to leave the room and take deep breaths before attempting murder. that's my take on it anyway.
I think having a large percentage of people who are descendants of rather hot-blooded Italian immigrants plays a part as well.
Lul.

Lol, almost forgot eu-boards exist...i've always come to the NA boards, though mostly like i felt that red-activity is/was much higher over on the NA boards aswell as overall player activity.
I just looked over and saw the highest views on a gameplay post were ~700, while over in NA any bigger post easly gets above 1k views

you have at best 10 upvotes on euw
here you can go to 1k

euw boards is just a ghost town

you know why? because it's seperated depending on languages unlike on NA, so that's why you get almost no one on EUW

it's not just the language, most in eu know english, sure it's not their first language and far from perfect(like my self), but usually enough to dwell in forums.
The major reason is that when they started to switch from the old forums to board style, there only was NA boards for quite some time, and anyone that really was interested in the forum would go there and then simply stay there even then Eu also got their boards. 
Also, especially befor the switch. red activity was FAR higher in NA.
The other is that Eu started already as a ghost town compared to NA as half(oe more) of the really eu users stayed at NA, so it was neither attractive for red activity nor players, which caused a cycle of it becomming even more of a ghost town which the made it even less attractive and so on.

> you have at best 10 upvotes on euw

Oh.

I got 2K lifetime upvotes on the EU boards.
570 on here but I've been here for a shorter time. 

It's not dead, it's just that eune is also there and they're way more toxic.
The EU community died along with the forums - everyone left for reddit.
Welcome , we have circlejerks instead so yeah :^).

Joder pues esto tampoco es que sea un buen sitio, hay demasiado circlejerk y tal. Las pocas discusiones que hay de balance en Reddit son más worth que leer esta basura de Boards una semana. 

Saludos desde España también.
Implying reddit is any better for discussion.
It is though
Like that 3k upvoted thread of buffing ADCs instead of nerfing tristana? :^)
It really isn't. Just a different circlejerk.
Eh, reddit is a circlejerk but the boards are simply toxic waste paired with some gifs.

Imo the main diffrence between EUW and NA is this. NA users just vote. EUW users read first and don't upvote every shit they also don't downvote just because they didn't understand it.

The upvotes on this one show it pretty well.
NA 4FUN REGION THAT'S WHY THE THING YOU SAY IS TRUE NA LUL
OCE is where memes come to die :^) that gives them #1
I wouldn't say so, most non americans are here because that's where the majority of people actually speak english, and the only board that Riot devs (barely) gives a crap about.
is eu forum uptight?

> [{quoted}](name=Wtf Jax,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rsBTQhEo,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-02-27T03:19:29.592+0000)
>
> This continent is so fukin&#039; amazing i would change to here with no doubt

Join the club it's called all of Earth.
Duh, that's why I only post here :P

To be honest I can't quite tell the difference, my threads get downvoted oftenly even when they don't mention anything sensative/crazy.

I guess you just gotta have the common opinion about something, and hope for the best.
I honestly would laugh if just as a joke for april fools they gave yasuo that buff on PBE

You are so right, here are actully people who WANT to discuss about the game and its issues, while in the german forums you only see people searching for duo mates or when you try to bring something up they just gonna shit talk to you and downvote ur post to oblivion lol.
The worst part is that I came here and suddenly find players that disappeared from the spanish forum months ago.

I have been posting here regularly for at least three months. 

I usually describe the situation as "I'm exiled from the Spain forums".
I mean, whenever I go to the boards it forces me to the na boards, I figured that this was  just the global thing, didn't even know separate boards for regions on the boards even existed.
